gunicorn.http.errors

Exceptions

ParseException

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

NoMoreData

Base class for I/O related errors.

InvalidRequestLine

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

InvalidRequestMethod

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

InvalidHTTPVersion

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

InvalidHeader

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

Base class for I/O related errors.

Base class for I/O related errors.

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

ForbiddenProxyRequest

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

InvalidSchemeHeaders

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
